attributes.action: Put the PM's Deal to a public vote - Her Deal or Remain
attributes.additional_details: The UK chose to leave.  But they did not choose May's deal.  The deal only represents the position of just one political party.   So if Government succeeds in approving her deal against the will of parliament, then the public need the final say in order to confirm the UK's position.
attributes.background: If Government approves Theresa May's Deal by 12 April, put this decision to a public vote for a final ratification.   The vote should have two options - Her deal or remain in the EU.
